content.rendered:
Directed by Satish Kaushik

Written by Imtiaz Hussain. Suman Ankur. Khandelwal Shashank. Imtiaz Hussain. Suman Ankur. Khandelwal Shashank. Satish Kaushik. Satish Kaushik

Cast Pankaj Tripathi(Bharatlal). Monal Gajjar(Rukmani (as M. Monal Gajjar)). Mita Vashisht(Ashrafi Devi (as Meeta Vashisht)). Amar Upadhyay(Jaganpal). Brijendra Kala(Judge (Allahabad)). Vijay Kumar(Sarpanch). Neha Chauhan(Sonia (Journalist)). Garrvil Mohan(Pablo (Photographer)). Satish Kaushik(Sadhuram). Sandeepa Dhar(… (Special Appearance)). Shadan Ahmed(Chachi). Mirza Azhar(Shishupal Kewat). Shri Prakash Bajpai(Chacha). Sushil Bonthiyal(Lekhpal Bhoorey Singh). Mahesh Chandra Deva(Typewriter (as Mahesh Deva)).Vikas Gupta. Salman Khan(Voice Narration). Seemant Kharwal(Goonga). Arpit Mishra(New Lekhpal ( S.C. Jain )).Tapi Mishra. Abhishek Narayan(Pension Officer). Pranay Narayan(Devilal).Akash Pandey. R.C. Pathak(Chief Minister (as Rc Pathak)). Lalit Singh Pokhriyal(Rehmat Ali). Dinesh Sharma(Pandit Ji Pandey). Pramod Sharma(Ahmad Miya). Arun Shekhar(Chaman Lal). Nawal Kishor Shukla(Rukmani’s Mama). Shivakant Shukla(Police officer). Abhinay Raj Singh(Bharatlal Son Abhi). Deependra Singh(Pankaj). Sharat Sonu(Rampal)

Language Hindi

Producers Soni Amit. Sushila Charak. Sharad Chaudhary. Eiqbal Jaafri. Nishant Kaushik. Shashi Kaushik. Vikas Malu. Santosh Rai. Kuldeep Singh. Neil Vijay Singh. Vishal Vats.

Production Salman Khan Films. The Sathish Kaushik Entertainment
